sense.def:
Mail
so pisma in paketi, ki jih dostavlja poštna služba.

seg.quote: If there's anything urgent in the mail, I'll deal with it.
Minnie was alone in the post office, sorting mail.

sense.def:
The mail
je sistem, ki ga uporablja poštna služba za zbiranje in dostavo pisem in paketov.

seg.quote: Send it to me by mail.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
mails something
, to pošlje po pošti.

seg.quote: The books had to be mailed directly from the publisher.
